question: 各駅停車
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>car</kanji> that <kanji>halt</kanji>s at <kanji>each</kanji> <kanji>station</kanji>. These trains aren't the big and fast ones, they're the <vocabulary>local train</vocabulary>s, and you'll need to ride them to get to smaller stations.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
